dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT ecr.OD_PB_ECR_ID , ecr.OD_PB_DATE_REQUESTED , ecr.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , ecr.OD_OB_FACTORY_NUMBER , ecr.OD_SC_REGION , ecr.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME , ecr.OD_PB_FACTORY_CONTACT , ecr.OD_PB_CHANGE_DESC , ecr.OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM , ecr.OD_PB_DATE_PROPOSED_PRODUCTION , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_AESTHETICS , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_DESIGN , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_LOCATION , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_PACKAGING , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_PERFORMANCE , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_SAFETY , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_SOFTWARE , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_SUBSTITUTION , ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGINEER , ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , ecr.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS , ecr.OD_PB_ATTACHMENT , ecr.OD_PB_COMMENTS , esk.OD_OB_SKU , esk.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC , esk.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME FROM apps.q_od_ob_ecr_sku_v esk , apps.q_od_ob_ecr_v ecr WHERE esk.OD_OB_REF_ECR(+)=ecr.od_pb_ecr_id AND NVL(ecr.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')=NVL(:p_vendor_name,NVL(ecr.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME,'X')=NVL(:p_factory_name,NVL(ecr.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(esk.OD_OB_SKU,1)=NVL(:p_sku,NVL(esk.OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(esk.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')=NVL(:p_dept_name,NVL(esk.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_PB_ECR_ID,'X')=NVL(:p_ecr_id,NVL(ecr.OD_PB_ECR_ID,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM,'X')=NVL(:p_report_no,NVL(ecr.OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGINEER,'X')=NVL(:p_submitter,NVL(ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGINEER,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')=NVL(:p_approver,NVL(ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X')=NVL(:p_approval_status,NVL(ecr.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X')) ORDER BY ecr.OD_PB_ECR_ID,esk.OD_OB_SKU,ecr.OD_PB_DATE_REQUESTED desc
